name: The name of the Prayer.
image: The featured image for the Prayer.
release: Array representing the month and year for the release date of the update that added the Prayer to the game.
update: The release message for the update that added the Prayer to the game.
members: A yes or no value indicating if the content can only be accessed in the game with a paid subscription.
level: The Prayer level at which this Prayer is unlocked.
drain: The drain rate at which this Prayer drains the player's Prayer points.
sound: The name of the sound file (in *.ogg format) that the game plays when this Prayer is activated.
